sub_topic: Predicting the solubility of inorganic salts in water
message_1: What is the solubility of Calcium chloride (CaCl2) in distilled water at room temperature?
message_2: The solubility of calcium chloride (CaCl2) in distilled water at room temperature (25°C or 77°F) is approximately 74.5 g per 100 mL of water. This means that 74.5 grams of CaCl2 can dissolve in 100 mL of water at room temperature, forming a saturated solution.
